DOC.detailed_description: A prospective randomize single-blind clinical trial conduct Hôpital du Sacré-Coeur de Montréal Hôpital Jean-Talon . All patient admit total knee arthroplasty ( TKA ) January 2012 September 2013 Outcome variable : Patient receive Floseal SOC Variables study : Primary end point : Need transfusion post-op ( yes/no , many ) Patient transfuse : Hg < 80 g/L plus patient symptomatic : orthostatic hypotension , tachycardia ( pulse > 100/min , hypotension ( < 90/60 ) , hx : CVA , CAD ) Secondary end point : 1 . Efficacy ( hospital stay ) - Pre-op post-op Hg ( > 100 ; 80-100 ; < 80 ) - Hemovac blood drainage ( ml ) - Per operative bleeding ( ml ) 2 . Safety ( Follow : 6wks , 6 m , 12 m , 24 m ) - Post-op complication : infection , pain , oedema , allergic reaction . - Functional outcome : Knee Society Score ( KSS ) , Western Ontario McMaster Universities questionnaire ( WOMAC ) , International knee documentation committee form ( IKDC )
DOC.criteria: All subject 18 year old admit TKA January 2012 September 2013at Hôpital du SacréCoeur de Montréal ( HSCM ) Hôpital JeanTalon ( HJT ) , Montréal , Quebec , Canada .
